author: huntingisland
content: Personally I think this argument ( https://dataalways.substack.com/p/endgame-perils-of-restaking  ) is compelling, additional sources of yield now make it impossible to manage total percentage of ETH staked via any changes to reward adjustment, controlling growth now requires a limit on the validator set.
